scripts.test:all: bun run test:api && bun run test:auth && bun run test:dashboard
scripts.typecheck: bun run --filter @godeploy/api typecheck && bun run --filter @godeploy/ui typecheck && bun run --filter @godeploy/auth typecheck && bun run --filter @godeploy/marketing typecheck
scripts.lint:workspaces: bun run --filter @godeploy/api lint && bun run --filter @godeploy/ui lint && bun run --filter @godeploy/auth lint && bun run --filter @godeploy/marketing lint
scripts.fmt:workspaces: bun run --filter @godeploy/api fmt && bun run --filter @godeploy/ui fmt && bun run --filter @godeploy/auth fmt && bun run --filter @godeploy/marketing fmt
scripts.docker:start: bun run docker:build && bun run docker:run
